Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Denzabar stopped. He grabbed his head and knealt. Something was coming back. 
Visions flew by his eyes at an enormous rate, finally they stopped. He was in 
a large building, made of metal and glass. He was on a podium of some sort. He 
looked down. The "Cybertronians" Were before him. He had a few other robots 
at his side. The Cybertronians were asking him something. He heard the name 
"Optimus" But wasn't sure. Permission to study...Study what? a Planet, Where 
decpticons and Autobots fought....hmmmmm...Earth....    The vision cut away.  
Denzabar looked up, "What was that..."

--part1_1d4.1290901e.2cbe7535_boundary
